rows.label: qst106008_msg0001
rows.name: Now, time to begin lesson two!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0002
rows.name:
Second period lesson is about
observation.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0003
rows.name:
You be greeted by three Nopon now.
Task for Hana is to deduce which
Nopon is merchant!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0004
rows.name:
Rurumu is called Ruruomu.
Pleasure to meet friends.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0005
rows.name:
Yo, friends. Me is cool Nopon,
name of Kalukalu.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0006
rows.name: Friends not be stranger, yeah?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0007
rows.name: Me is called Yatata.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0008
rows.name:
One Nopon out of three is merchant.
Does Hana know which?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0009
rows.name: Who is the merchant?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0010
rows.name: Rurumu

rows.label: qst106008_msg0011
rows.name: Kalukalu

rows.label: qst106008_msg0012
rows.name: Yatata

rows.label: qst106008_msg0013
rows.name:
Bad choosing. Answer was wrong!
But there always time to try again!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0014
rows.name:
Correct choice! Hana make very
decisive decision there.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0015
rows.name: But next question will be harder!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0016
rows.name: My name is Beltran.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0017
rows.name:
Name's Gruth.
And don't you forget it.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0018
rows.name:
Hi there.
My name's Cheelo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0019
rows.name:
Now then. Which of these three
posed while introducing self?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0020
rows.name: Who was it that posed?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0021
rows.name: Gruth

rows.label: qst106008_msg0022
rows.name: Beltran

rows.label: qst106008_msg0023
rows.name: Cheelo

rows.label: qst106008_msg0024
rows.name:
Too bad. Answer is wrong!
But feel free to try one time more!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0025
rows.name: Correct answer!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0026
rows.name:
Hana very good at this.
Highly refined skill of observation!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0027
rows.name:
Always noticing slightest change,
never missing single thing!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0028
rows.name:
Good sense of observation very
important skill in life and learning.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0029
rows.name:
Should try to hone observation skill
even more in future!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0030
rows.name: Yes, teacher Fuwafuwa!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0031
rows.name:
Well then, next is third period!
Keep up good work!
